column1: Smoque BBQ////Oh my god.  Everything we had here was outstanding.  We had the pulled pork
column2: which was moist and tender and served on a perfect roll
column3: as well as a taste of ribs
column5: fries and beans - all delicious.  There was a line out the door and we waited about 30 mins to order our food but it was well worth it.  Staff was friendly and accommodating.
